Text.val: -- Calculate totals for the use in G.S.

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBB join :1/DEBC on DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO = :2 where DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO for fetch only
